name: Chicken Hunter (itch) (del1an)
description:
Summary

You get 10 points by hunting a chicken and 50 points by eating the butter chicken ... but be careful there might be some side effects

There is also a timer than increase if you eat the butter chicken

Controls

WASD - Movement

ESC/P - Pause 

You can change the mouse sensitivity from the pause menu

Info

This is my first game jam, I've been learning unreal engine as a hobby, I'm a gameplay programmer so I downloaded most of the assets online.
